ai.summary: A short, easy 1.9 km walk in the UK designed for beginners and families. The route offers gentle scenery, mostly flat terrain, and a relaxed pace suitable for a quick outdoor outing.
ai.terrain_summary: Predominantly flat, well-maintained paths with small grassy sections and a few gentle slopes. Surfaces include compact gravel and dirt; expect seasonal mud after rain.
ai.safety_notes: General outdoor safety for UK walks: wear sturdy footwear, check the weather before you go, and bring a light jacket. Stay on marked trails, watch for muddy or slippery sections, and mind gates or stiles. Supervise children and dogs, and carry a charged phone and basic navigation if you’re unfamiliar with the area.
recommended_gear: Sturdy walking shoes or lightweight boots
Phone charged and battery backup (power bank optional)
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn for the most pleasant conditions; the walk is still doable in winter with warm clothing and daylight planning.

seo.title: Hanna's Close Walk – Easy 1.9 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore Hanna's Close Walk, a gentle 1.9 km easy hike in the UK. Learn about terrain, safety tips, and gear for this short, family-friendly route.
